snippet.title: MLB The Show 18 – All Star Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/mlb-the-show-18-ps4/

Learn more here:  theshow.com
http://theshownation.com/
https://www.facebook.com/mlbtheshow/
https://twitter.com/sonysandiego
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/mlb-the-show-18-ps4/

Celebrate the 2018 MLB All-Star Game in MLB The Show 18!  Play the All-Star Game as your favorite All-Stars from the National and American Leagues.  Enter the Homerun Derby with your favorite player, past or present, or play the All-Star themed missions to win exclusive rewards!  The All-Star Edition is now live with even more in-game items to catch you up to all your friends.

Your team. Your rivals. Your buddies. Your hometown. No matter why you play or why you love baseball, MLB® The Show™ 18 is for a fan like you. More home runs, more epic plays, more classic legends, all in less time. For those who crave the best of baseball — Welcome to The Show™.

Experience the best of baseball in MLB® The Show™ 18.

Available Now!

Major League Baseball and Minor League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball Properties, Inc. and MLB Advanced Media, L.P., as applicable. All rights reserved. Visit MLB.com, the Official Site of Major League Baseball and MiLB.com, the Official Site of Minor League Baseball.

© 2018 Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC
